name: Reynolds Consumer Products Inc.
description: Reynolds Consumer Products Inc. is a leading manufacturer and marketer of consumer products, primarily focused on disposable food service and household products. Founded in 1947, the company has a rich history of innovation in the consumer goods sector, with a commitment to delivering high-quality, reliable products that enhance the cooking and dining experience. Reynolds is best known for its iconic aluminum foil, which has become a staple in kitchens around the world. The company also offers a diverse range of products including plastic wraps, baking papers, and disposable tableware under well-known brands such as Reynolds Wrap, Hefty, and more. With a strong emphasis on sustainability, Reynolds Consumer Products is dedicated to reducing its environmental footprint through improved packaging solutions and responsible sourcing practices. The company's mission is to continue to innovate in the consumer products space while ensuring consumer satisfaction and environmental stewardship. Reynolds Consumer Products is headquartered in Lake Forest, Illinois, and operates with a vision of making everyday life easier and more enjoyable for consumers.

seo.meta_title: Reynolds Consumer Products Inc. | Quality Food and Household Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Reynolds Consumer Products Inc., a leader in food storage and disposable products. Discover our commitment to quality, sustainability, and consumer satisfaction.

faq.question: What products does Reynolds Consumer Products offer?
faq.answer: Reynolds Consumer Products offers aluminum foil, plastic wrap, baking paper, trash bags, and disposable tableware.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Reynolds Consumer Products?
faq.answer: Simon K. W. Wong is the CEO of Reynolds Consumer Products Inc.

faq.question: Where is Reynolds Consumer Products headquartered?
faq.answer: Reynolds Consumer Products is headquartered in Lake Forest, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: When was Reynolds Consumer Products founded?
faq.answer: Reynolds Consumer Products was founded in 1947.
